# Improve existing documentation

Use this template to suggest edits or improvements to existing docs.

## Document path
Which file(s) should be updated? Provide relative paths.

## Problem or gap
Describe the issue (typo, outdated content, missing example, inaccurate commands).

## Proposed change
Explain what you'd like to change and why. If possible include a short example diff or replacement paragraph.

## Impact
Who will benefit and are there any risks? (e.g., breaking links, outdated commands)

---
Fill this form and create an issue; contributors can then open a small PR with the proposed changes.
